fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 4.80 points or 0.02% to settle at 19,347.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, tumbled 3.47% to 11.80. Reliance Industries, ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
